attributes.action: set up CCTV networks in all secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If secondary schools had CCTV cameras placed inside the building aswell as just on the outside maybe the levels of misbehaviour would drop. Teachers would have the power to show the parents of the unruly kid[s] just how 'well behaved' they are in class.
